    • Uses of Rule in com.wisper.cli.rule

      Subclasses of Rule in com.wisper.cli.rule 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AndRule
      Combines multiple rules with a logical and connection: all rules have to be met.
      class  CombinedRule
      Combines multiple rules with a logical connection.
      class  NotRule 
      class  OptionSetRule
      Requires that the given option(s) is/are set.
      class  OrRule
      Combines multiple rules with a logical or connection: at least one has to be met.
      class  XorOptionsRule
      Accepts input if exactly one of the given options/flags is set/specified.
      class  XorRule
      Only accepts input when exactly one of the specified rules are met.
